sn10.4:1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā magadhesu vihārati maṇimālike cetiye maṇibhaddassa yakkhassa bhavane. Atha kho maṇibhaddo yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn10.4:2: "Satīmato sadā bhaddaṁ,satimā sukhamedhati;Satīmato suve seyyo,verā ca parimuccatī"ti.
sn10.4:3: "Satīmato sadā bhaddaṁ,satimā sukhamedhati;Satīmato suve seyyo,verā na parimuccati.
sn10.4:4: Yassa sabbamahorattaṁ,ahiṁsāya rato mano;Mettaṁso sabbabhūtesu,veraṁ tassa na kenacī"ti.
